Module kivakit.core
Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.listeners

Interface MessageCounter

All Superinterfaces:
Listener, NamedObject, Receiver, Transceiver, Transmitter
All Known Implementing Classes:
MessageList, ValidationIssues
public interface MessageCounter extends Listener
A Listener, such as MessageList that is able to report how many of different kinds of messages it has seen.

Counting Message by Message Type

To get a count of a specific message type like Warning or Problem, the method count(Class) can be used: 

 var warnings = count(Warning.class)
 var problems = count(Problem.class)

To get the count of messages with a status worse than or equal to a given message type: 

 var errors = countWorseThanOrEqualTo(Problem.class)

Message Statistics

To display message statistics to a user, the statistics(Class[]) method returns a StringList detailing how many of each message type were found: 

 var statistics = statistics(Warning.class, Problem.class)

Counting Messages by Status

The count(Message.Status) method returns the number of messages of a given Message.Status type it has seen. For example, messages that represent failure would have the status type Message.Status.FAILED: 

 var failed = count(FAILED)
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
See Also:
Message, Message.Status, MessageList
